mapper.insert: insert into route (r_id, r_name, p_id, o_startingCity, p_midpoint, r_midpoint, p_endCity, r_endCityId, r_transporPr, r_remarks) values (#{rId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oStartingcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pMidpoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rMidpoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pEndcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rEndcityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rTransporpr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update route set r_name = #{rName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_id = #{pId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, o_startingCity = #{oStartingcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_midpoint = #{pMidpoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_midpoint = #{rMidpoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_endCity = #{pEndcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_endCityId = #{rEndcityid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r_transporPr = #{rTransporpr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, r_remarks = #{rRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where r_id = #{rId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select r_id, r_name, p_id, o_startingCity, p_midpoint, r_midpoint, p_endCity, r_endCityId, r_transporPr, r_remarks from route where r_id = #{rId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
